Level 6 Transmutation Spell

Atrophy a foe, Restraining them until they permanently turn to gold.

Target will Goldify if it does not succeed its Saving Throw within 3 turns.

18mCON Save Concentration

Flesh to Gold is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Flesh to Gold is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Flesh to Gold is identical to Flesh to Stone, however the effects of Flesh to Gold are permanent, do not require concentration, and does not expend a spell slot (since it is a scroll). For these reasons, it is one of the strongest spells in the game.

Flesh to Gold Information

Description: Atrophy a foe, Restraining them until they permanently turn to gold. Target will Goldify if it does not succeed its Saving Throw within 3 turns. Level: Lvl 6 spell School: Transmutation School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: CON Save
